definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: He hates cartoons, so every time he sees them he .
sentences.chinese: 他討厭動畫片，所以每次看見了他都轉檯。

sentences.english: Don't see the cartoon yet, Bo-Bo.
Gain many prizes for nation. Children all over the world will watch my cartoons.
sentences.chinese: 拿大獎，爲國爭光，讓全世界小孩都看我的動畫片。

sentences.english: Traditionally, Chinese cartoons were only released on TV.
sentences.chinese: 傳統上，中國的動畫片只在中國放映。
一個人只喜歡誰“動畫片。”

sentences.english: Children would like to see a cartoon, my mother's face still had the old chief.
sentences.chinese: 小孩想看看動畫片，媽媽的臉拉得老長。

sentences.english: But in recent years, TV cartoons have been declining in viewership.
sentences.chinese: 但是最近幾年，電視動畫片的收視率不斷下降。

sentences.english: This film is the first British animation sold to an American network.
sentences.chinese: 這是第一部出售給美國電視網的英國動畫片。

sentences.english: Animation uses motion and misuses the laws of physics.
sentences.chinese: 動畫片會使用動作，並扭曲物理定律。
中國的動畫片都很難看。

sentences.english: The Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer (MGM) hired him in 1937 as animation director.
sentences.chinese: 納受僱於米高梅製片公司，當動畫片製作人。

sentences.english: Many non-animated comedies open this summer as well.
sentences.chinese: 還有很多非動畫片在今夏隆重上演。

sentences.english: Full text is divided into five chapters.
sentences.chinese: 全臭作動畫片全集下載文共分爲五章。

sentences.english: We laughed like children, and we watched a lot of Walt Disney.
sentences.chinese: 我們就像孩子一樣大笑，還看了不少迪士尼動畫片。

definition: cartoons and comics/animes and mangas/cartoon (animated movie)/anime
dialogue (in a movie or a play)
Crayon Shin-chan (クレヨンしんちゃん), Japanese manga and anime series popular in China
American TV series/abbr. for 美國電視劇|美国电视剧
